remarks: Properties that determine a Moore collection.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 30-Jan-2015.)
statement:
ismred.ss $e |- ( ph -> C C_ ~P X ) $.
ismred.ba $e |- ( ph -> X e. C ) $.
ismred.in $e |- ( ( ph /\ s C_ C /\ s =/= (/) ) -> |^| s e. C ) $.
ismred $p |- ( ph -> C e. ( Moore ` X ) ) $.
$d C s $.
$d X s $.
$d ph s $.
